sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Maneuver) Whenever the character misses an opponent with a combat check and generates 1 triumph or 3 advantage, the character may spend this to perform a Force power action that targets one or more allies as a maneuver (he must still be able to perform maneuvers, and may not perform more than two maneuvers in a turn).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Unity Assault</name> <number>TAL0001151</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-02-07 22:26:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>fc877ec2db3ac4102901de90cf961920</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-02-07 22:26:28</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
